allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix topology bugs, optimize core operations, reduce duplication

Fix three P0 bugs: getFaceGroup always returning nullptr, ObjectPool::clear\(\)
leaking memory by skipping destructors, and DimensionChord sharing data lost
on save/load round-trip.

Optimize core topology operations: deleteEdge now uses DCEL half-edge face
pointers for O\(1\) lookup instead of scanning all faces, mergeNodes uses
unordered_set and targeted face rebuilds instead of O\(E^2\) linear scans,
and node removal after merge no longer redundantly re-scans all edges.

Extract duplicated half-edge loop logic into resetHalfEdgeLoop and
buildHalfEdgeLoop helpers. Extract metadata into MetadataHolder base class.
Remove dead parallel edge code from TopoEdge, clean up empty constraint
deduction logic, and replace magic safety limit with named constant.
Fix OccView node discovery to use EntityOwner for O\(1\) identification.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
